author: ianna
body:
- Muon data description directories/files cleanup:
  - introduced two sub-directories for Phase II scenarios: with and without ME0
  - obsolete, unused, duplicated files removed
  - no changes in scenarios which already included Muon sub-dets
- Update CFCal scenarios to include ME0
- Update all Shashlik scenarios to include ME0
title: 2023 Scenarios Cleanup
